Examples

RegisterThread.cpp

00001
00002 #include "RegisterThread.h"
00003
00004 using namespace Omiscid;
00005
00006 // Implementation of static members of RegisterThread
00007 AtomicCounter RegisterThread::NbRegistered; /* A static value to count registered services */
00008 Event             RegisterThread::NewServiceIsRegistered; /* A static value to count registered services */
00009
00010     /* @brief Create a new thread that will register a thread
00011      * give its number
00012      */
00013 RegisterThread::RegisterThread(unsigned int MyNumber) :
00014 #ifdef DEBUG_THREAD
00015     Thread( "RegisterThread" )
00016 #else
00017     Thread()
00018 #endif
00019 {
00020     // Set my Number and Start
00021     Number = MyNumber;
00022 }
00023
00024 /* @brief destructor (all destructor must be virtual !) */
00025 RegisterThread::~RegisterThread()
00026 {
00027     // nothing else to do, the thread destructor will call StopThread
00028 }
00029
00030 /* @brief The Run procedure of the thread, so what he must do */
00031 void FUNCTION_CALL_TYPE RegisterThread::Run()
00032 {
00033     // Ask to the service factory to create a Service. The service is not
00034     // register yet. We do not provide the service class, the default value 'Service'
00035     // will be used
00036
00037     Omiscid::Service * pServ = ServiceFactory.Create( "RegisterThread" );
00038
00039     // If something tricky occurred, exit
00040     if ( pServ == NULL )
00041     {
00042         OmiscidError( "Could not register the service (my number is %d).\n", Number );
00043
00044         // Exit the thread
00045         return;
00046     }
00047
00048     // Just add a Variable of ConstantAccess that can not be modifies after the
00049     // service registration. Set its value to the number given in the constructor
00050     // We ask not to check the value with internal contron
00051     pServ->AddVariable( "Number", "integer", "My number", ConstantAccess );
00052     pServ->SetVariableValue( "Number", Number, true );
00053
00054     // Start the service, i.e. register it and run all processing threads
00055     pServ->Start();
00056
00057     // Say that there is one more RegisterThread Instance runnnig
00058     NbRegistered++;
00059     NewServiceIsRegistered.Signal();
00060
00061     // Wait for some to ask the thread to stop
00062     WaitForStop();
00063
00064     // Delete the constructed service and die (i.e existing the Run() function).
00065     delete pServ;
00066     NbRegistered--;
00067 }
